column4: Is it possible to "merge" an empty partition (by let say destroying it) with my current ubuntu partition without damaging my installation?
one of the partition is empty, it could be unformatted space

if you have separate '/' (root) and separate /home then merge that empty partition to /home and not to / thus reducing the risk of damage. if you dont have such separte / adn /home thne there will be always a risk of damage. do that carefully
